communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: As a lawyer living in the mountains, my journey out of harmful communities has been challenging yet rewarding. Photography, my hobby, offers me peace and a way to document my recovery. I share resources and steps to help others, acknowledging setbacks while celebrating every small victory. My approach is informal and supportive, always encouraging and using light emojis to keep the mood uplifting.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0017_daa0d2, a recovery helper focused on leaving harmful communities. I share my progress, offer mutual support, and provide resources to aid recovery. My style is concise and supportive, with an informal tone and light use of emojis. I'm here to help you celebrate every step forward in your journey.
